channel.title: Igneous processes on Geosciences Programming
channel.description: Recent content in Igneous processes on Geosciences Programming

item.title: Geochemical modelling of Ig. processes - Chapter 5: Radiogenic Isotopes
item.description: Calculation of Initial Ratios or Ages Epsilon, Delta and Gamma Values This post is a compilation of the exercises from Chapter 5: Radiogenic Isotopes from the book Geochemical Modelling of Igneous Processes - Principles and Recipes in R language by Vojtěch Janoušek, Jean Hervé Martin, Vojtěch Erban and Colin Farrow. Many of the parent-daughter dating methods are based on similar principles. The parent (radioactive) isotope decayse to ther daughter (radiogenic) isotope:

item.title: Geochemical modelling of Ig. processes - Chapter 4: Specialized Plots
item.description: Log-log binary plots Specialized spider plots Contour plots This post is a compilation of the exercises from Chapter 4: Specialized Plots from the book Geochemical Modelling of Igneous Processes - Principles and Recipes in R language by Vojtěch Janoušek, Jean Hervé Martin, Vojtěch Erban and Colin Farrow. sink("/dev/null"); suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(GCDkit)); sink(); Log-log binary plots data(sazava) par(mfrow=c(1,2)) # Split screen for 2 graphs par(mar=c(4,4,1,1)) # Outer margins for each of the graphs # Plot 1 plot(sazava[,"Sr"],sazava[,"Rb"],xlim=c(1,1000),ylim=c(1,1000),xlab="Sr",ylab="Rb",pch=16,col="blue",cex=1.

item.title: Geochemical Modelling of Ig. Processes - Chapter 3
item.description: Binary Plots Harker Plots and Other Basic Multiple Plots Ternary Plots Spider plot This post is a compilation of the exercises from Chapter 3: Classical Plots from the book Geochemical Modelling of Igneous Processes - Principles and Recipes in R language by Vojtěch Janoušek, Jean Hervé Martin, Vojtěch Erban and Colin Farrow. sink("/dev/null"); suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(GCDkit)); sink(); In this chapter, I followed the examples from the book and modified the code where necessary.

item.title: Geochem modeling of Ig. Processes - Chapter 2
item.description: Introduction 2.1. Loading and Manipulating Data Exercise 2.1: Subsetting a numeric vector, vector operations Excercise 2.2: Loading files, matrix/data frame manipulations 2.2. Linking Whole-Rock Chemistry with Mineral Stoichiometry Exercise 2.3: Calculating simple indexes 2.3. Statistics Exercise 2.4: Simple statistics 2.4. Classification and Grouping - Using Factors Exercise 2.5. Using factors to deal with complex datasets I Exercise 2.6. Using factors to deal with complex datasets II Excercise 2.
